name: MyUniden
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Enable the My Uniden Skill in your Alexa App, and you can check-in on your property by simply saying “Alexa, show the front door.”

Please note that you are only able to view video steam and listen to audio from your Uniden Camera; you will not

be able to speak to people through your Echo Show.

To get started, simply tap the “Enable” button, link your Alexa account to your My Uniden account. After linking your account and discovering your Uniden cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming video to your Echo Show or Echo Spot with commands like:
- "Alexa, show the front camera"
- "Alexa, show the living room camera "

To stop your Uniden camera from streaming video, you can say:
- "Alexa, stop the front camera"

When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the device name of your camera and can be found and configured in the app. You can also add Uniden cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app。
